technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.

defensiveness: The participant is somewhat defensive about their decision not to get vaccinated, providing justifications and expressing distrust in the vaccine.

vaccine_importance: The participant expresses distrust in the COVID-19 vaccine and questions its effectiveness, suggesting a belief that it is not very important.

general_notes: The participant is skeptical about the COVID-19 vaccine and boosters, citing personal experiences and concerns about the speed of development and potential long-term effects. They also share an anecdote about their therapist predicting the pandemic.
